Class SourceSelectionChangedListener

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.event.SelectionChangedListener<ModelData>
      com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.event.SourceSelectionChangedListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener<SelectionChangedEvent<ModelData>>, java.util.EventListener
public class SourceSelectionChangedListener
extends SelectionChangedListener<ModelData>

A SelectionChangedListener that ignores its own selection events. Useful when registering the provider with the SelectionService.
